text: Roar Pedersen Bakke (24 November 1927 - 9 November 1989) was a Norwegian ice hockey player, born in Drammen, Norway. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in 1952, where the Norwegian team placed 9th. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1927 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Ice hockey players at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Drammen
title: Roar Pedersen
